title: Central Boutique Hotel in Sighisoara, Romania
text: The Central Boutique Hotel in Sighisoara, Romania is a wonderful place to stay.  There are three apartments to choose from all with a washing machine in the apartment.  The owner is highly responsive and offers high end accommodations with high end linens, internet/tv, and very nice decor.  They also provide many extras such as coffee, tea, snacks, and computer use.  This is a great place to stay directly within walking distance of the old town and many great restaurants!  I will stay here again on my next return!

title: A leading hotel booking App,
text: Top rated customer service, variety of options, and great prices

title: A fraud
text:
We booked a new years stay at a hotel in Vichayito, Peru. We took an flight from Lima, Peru to Vichayito two days before new years. Some days before we had already received an email from Booking.com confirming our booking again. When we arrived to the hotel, they showed us that booking.com had never made the booking for us. The hotel was full. We had our children and elders with us. We had to pay an exorbitant amount of money to find something far removed from the destination we wanted because we didnâ€™t have a booking and our return flight was five days away. When we write to booking we got no response and there was no number to call inmediately to help with a new booking.
I will never use booking again and will advise friends in Boston and New York against trusting it.

title: Their customer service representative Lie.
text: I booked a luxury apt for a getaway for me and my boyfriend, it was such a great deal to pass up. $89.90 plus $100 deposits. I get email from the apt excited to have us .  Told us instruction about checking  in and checking out. When we showed up. There was no one there to greet us. No one answered out calls, after about 1.5 hrs waiting for someone to respond. We finally got an email saying that we were never approved for the apt, that the apartment had no power and they had asked the website to take down the post weeks ago. I asked about the email I received excited to have us, they apparently were automatically sent. When i called booking.com  I spoke to a Mr. Mohammed. Who was very apologetic, and guaranteed me that heâ€™d find a place just as great as that was. He failed, he said all had was the Holiday Inn, nothing even close to what we wanted, but he said the room would be on them, so we decided to take them up on the offer. We would pay for the room and send them the invoice for the cost of the room and they would pay us back. After $230 we sent the invoice and booking.com send a credit of $43. They refused to honor what there representative told us and hung up. I tried for weeks with no help. They are a horrible company who will tell lies to save a sale. We would of just took the refund if we would of know we had to pay for the Holiday Inn. Itâ€™s totally unfair. And they donâ€™t care.

title: Girls trip
text: 2 of us planned a trip to lancaster PA which turned in to 6.  Very easy to add rooms.  Then a price notification came through for $100 cheaper.  Very easy to book 3 rooms and cancel others.  I double checked and spoke with a person and bookings.com was great.

title: Easy to reserve, had the availability I needed. I am very happy
text: Thanks for making it easy to reserve!

title: Beware
text: I made reservations for Professor Tiki Hideaway. When arriving there was no there to greet you, no lobby,nothing. Tried calling the so called office with no luck. I believe this was fraud I left. The next morning I called Motel.com talk to 3 different representatives that was working from another country. They refused to give me a refund telling me itâ€™s because I left. Iâ€™ll try posting some pictures

title: Lovely apartment
text:
We really enjoyed our stay! The hosts were attentive and responsive from the time we booked until the time we left.  Simon greeted us at the apartment which is really beautiful, located on a small quiet, backstreet. It had everything we needed including a rain shower and blow dryer. The bed is very comfortable and the kitchen is well appointed. The heat worked well in the bedroomâ€¦ very comfortable.
We would stay there again!!! Thank you Simon and  Edgar!

title: Hotel stays
text: I do love booking as it is easy to find places nearby where your events are located. I have only had one issue with booking and that was when my hotel was over booked and I was not able to stay at that hotel. Itâ€™s just frustrating after a long drive when you are exhausted.

title: Especially easy to work with!
text: As a loyal customer I had a negative experience with the property in which I booked through Booking.com.   I just happened to call and confirm with the property a week before my spring break at a popular destination.   I was told the property was sold and Iâ€™ve been canceled.  The property failed to contact me as well as booking.com.  I immediately reached out and was told I would not have to pay anything and  they would help me find another property. With such short notice and 95 percent of the properties sold out, I was able to find one that met my standards.  At this point the prices almost doubled but Booking.com gave it to me at the same price when I booked over six months ago. Thank you booking.com!

title: Quaint but a bit loud
text: Not a bad little studio. Bathroom is small and would be tough for a handicap accessible need. The road noise is very loud and can hear it like youâ€™re outside, but being located right on the main road kind of expect that. The pillows seem to be more of a decorative type, not actual bed pillows. Tony was great with communications!  Everything else was fine!

title: Book directly with the Hotel
text:
Booking.com is terrible.   Have tried 3 times to access my account to get a reservation .each time they said I would get a reset email but they never came and I checked my spam and called my ISP to confirm they were not holding the email.  VERY  FRUSTRATING- I see on my credit card the charge for the room but I have no confirmation email.  
I have wasted so much time on this just to get a simple receipt/confirmation.  
I was booking a hotel through Southwest Airlines and got transferred to Booking.com, required me to download the app but I canâ€™t log into the app .
I found I could have saved about $30 by booking directly with the hotel 
At thi point I just want confirmation of my reservation. Ridiculous!!!!!
I am deleting the app and will have nothing to do with Booking.com in the future

title: Horrible
text:
Lost our room and got no help from Booking.com

I would go with another company - ANY other company.
